snippet.title: Odd or even, it is back to work for Delhi

localized.description:
Delhi's litmus test, with office goers back at work, how has the odd even plan worked? And while it will certainly ease traffic congestion making all our commutes easier, how far will it go in tackling pollution? We debate on Left, Right and Centre.
Watch full video: http://www.ndtv.com/video/player/left-right-centre/pathankot-attack-will-it-derail-india-pakistan-talks/397520?yt
Download the NDTV news app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.july.ndtv&referrer=utm_source%3Dyoutubecards%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dyoutube
